features: Compact cabinet fits small spaces and adds perfect storage space to all-sized bathrooms
Mirror door knob and classic beadboard design adds character that blends with all bathroom styles
Easy to mount on a wall
body.description: The RiverRidge Home Ashland collection - single door wall cabinet is the perfect hide-away for toiletries and other bathroom items for a fresh and clean appearance. Interior fixed shelf/open shelf dimensions 14.375 in. W x 5.75 in. D. 12.313 in. H. Redecorate your bathroom with matching additional Ashland Collection storage designs.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Complete the look with products from our Ashland Collection! Elevate your home with the Ashland Collection and enjoy the beauty of beadboard design, smart storage solutions, and a range of color options to suit your individual style. These pieces offer the best of both worlds, helping you stay organized without compromising on style. Our Ashland Collection features concealed storage, allowing you to keep your belongings neatly tucked away, while display shelves provide a showcase for your favorite decorations and easily accessible items. With practical and versatile storage features, such as towel bars and easy-slide drawers, you'll find this collection to be both convenient and stylish. Plus, Ashland furniture pieces are available in multiple colors and are family-friendly, specifically built with adjustable anti-tip wall mounts for added stability.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great little cabinet and good quality. Grabbed it when on sale for $30, very worth it! We spray painted the silver knob and hinges matte black to match our other bathroom hardware.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 25, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great cabinet very easy to put it together
reviews.reviewText: It’s perfect!! First-able I love the design, it’s little traditional for me. I usually like modern design, but it is done very nicely. I can fit many things inside it, my sink is completely empty except for hand soap.I also want to mention the color. Evan tho it doesn’t match with anything in the toilet, but as a standalone cabinet it’s looks very nice.Also craftsmanship of this cabinet is amazing. Very strongly made, but it’s incredibly light.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My son's bathroom has little drywall space, it's mostly tile but this cabinet fit perfect!! it was very easy to put together. prob took me about 20 min. arrived fast and had no scratches or imperfections.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good size and value
reviews.reviewText: This looks nice on the wall, is a good size for my small bathroom and the quality is good. It arrived quickly, was well packaged, all the parts were included and the instructions were clear. The reason for less stars is that the holes were not drilled on the back or to attach the door hinges. I had to drill them out myself. I wanted the door to open from the right so was able to drill holes on the opposite side. It worked out for me but if I didn’t have a power drill I would’ve returned it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not cheaply built. Great for the money
reviews.reviewText: The cabinet is not too large which I wanted . It looks great in my bathroom and cans of deodorant and such fit perfect on the lower shelf leaving plenty of room on the top shelf for hairdryers and such. The gray color matches my bathroom perfect . Highly recommend .try going to bed bath and beyond for one and you will pay double . Easy to assemble and everything is labeled . Took 20 min and it was on my wall using the heavy duty screw anchor provided .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the style and the Color
reviews.reviewText: I put these together all by myself and only needed an extra hand to hold it up while I installed them by myself. Super easy and I cannot even explain how much I love the color of these. They are grey with a blue hue to them. Exactly what I wanted. The style is cute too. Great product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Can't believe I put it together
reviews.reviewText: I am not experienced at assembly but decided to tackle this and had it done pretty fast! Checked to make sure I had all the parts and always afraid I'll be missing screws or hardware but it was all there, didnt count each screw but no extras so don't lose anything! I got the gray because it was less expensive and I think I'll probably paint it to match the dark gray vanity it's sitting on top of that's upside down and not installed yet, and maybe change the knob. It's a pretty light/medium gray though. It's cute and just the right size to fit over the new toilet once it's installed, it's a very small bathroom so the majority of them are too large. This is about the same width as a toilet tank. It's very hard to find any of these pre-assembled or in a store. I considered putting a couple open shelves in the space instead but they're hard to keep things looking neat and I prefer toiletries to be behind a closed door. I wish my bathroom was just a guest powder room that would get little use but not the case. If you need something like this I highly recommend it.Update, I painted it. It doesn't match exactly in daylight but the bathroom it will be in has no windows. You can tell it's painted, added a couple photos. I also ordered new matching acrylic and satin nickel door pulls for the vanity and cabinet.EDIT: I had such a great experience with the gray one I bought the white one on sale and it's missing holes in the back to attach the back, the top and bottom won't go all the way on (could not screw cam bolts all the way in), it's missing two screws for part 5 the rear cross bar which are not even in the instructions but they're on the gray one and there are holes for them. I was almost done putting it together when I gave up. I packed it back up and processed a return, did not want to deal with it anymore. If I could've gotten the cam bolts screwed in all the way it probably would've come together OK but there wasn't hardware to fill in the holes on the crossbar and the back was hard to screw in also, although do-able.Pros are it's small, good price and looks nice in a small space, Cons are assembly is hit or miss depending on the parts you get, and it only opens in one direction. You could make it open the other way if you drill your own holes directly opposite where they are now and reverse where you attach the hinges and magnetic closure.
Cumplió y superó mis expectativas,Muy bonita y buenos acabados

reviews.reviewTitle: Nice little shelf and very easy to assemble.
reviews.reviewText: This has to be the easiest diy shelf to put together. Instructions are clear and everything is marked properly. Simply follow the guide and it’s almost impossible to make mistakes. The quality is acceptable for what the price is. Very satisfied with this purchase.

I absolutely adore this little cabinet! It came quickly and well packaged with no damage. My husband found it easy to put together. It’s very cute and fits in perfectly with our bathroom decor. This is the best price I’ve seen. Excellent seller and recommend this purchase to anyone! A very happy customer! 😀

relatively easy to assemble and looks great on the wall. The only complaint I have is that the door is NOT drilled to be reversible. If you want it to open from the other side, you have to do it yourself.

reviews.reviewTitle: Easy to build and good quality
reviews.reviewText: This is perfect for my small bathroom to add some extra storage. It was delivered on time, easy to build and hang.
